title: 'Goosebumps' spooks 'Spies,' 'Crimson Peak' at box office
text:
> Entertainment 'Goosebumps' spooks 'Spies,''Crimson Peak' at box office In this image released by Disney, Tom Hanks, from right, Mark Rylance and Billy Magnusson appear in a scene from the film, "Bridge of Spies." (Jaap Buitendijk/DreamWorks Pictures/Fox 2000 Pictures via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
